scripts.prebuild: npx rimraf dist # Deletes the folder `dist` containing the compiled JavaScript files
scripts.build: npx tsc # Compiles the TypeScript files in `srv` to JavaScript artifacts in the `dist` folder
scripts.postbuild: npx copyfiles -u 1 -e "./src/**/*.ts" -a "./src/**/*.*" "dist" # Copies the other "static" files e.g. CDS files from `src` to `dist`
scripts.start:ts: cds serve dist/srv/world.cds # Starts the server based on the compiled JavaScript files (be sure to run `npm run build` before!)
scripts.test: npx jest --silent # Runs the tests on the TypeScript code
